message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm offering it to you for $14,000. I think it's a very fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share this product with me. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a significant return on your investment.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $12,500.
